common.name: FRENZY AMPLIFIER
common.description: Eliminations grant 10% Attack Speed and 15% Move Speed for 3s.

rare.name: AFTERMARKET FIRING PIN
rare.description: Increases Attack Speed by 10% and Move Speed by 5%.

rare.name: ADVANCED NANOBIOTICS
rare.description: Increases Weapon Power by 5%. After healing an ally, gain 10% Attack Speed for 3s.

rare.name: SHIELDBUSTER
rare.description: Increases Weapon Power by 5%. After dealing damage to Shields or Armor, gain 15% Attack Speed for 1s.

rare.name: STOCKPILE
rare.description: Increases Attack Speed by 5% and Max Ammo by 25%.

rare.name: TECHNOLEECH
rare.description: Increases Weapon Power by 5% and provides 10% Weapon Lifesteal.

rare.name: ICY COOLANT
rare.description: Increases Weapon Power by 10% and provides 5% Cooldown Reduction.

rare.name: TALON MODIFICATION MODULE
rare.description: Increases Weapon Power by 15%.

epic.name: CODEBREAKER
epic.description: Increases Weapon Power by 15%. Ignore 50% of Armor's damage reduction.

epic.name: SALVAGED SLUGS
epic.description: Increases Attack Speed by 10%. 30% Increased Damage to Barriers. Dealing Weapon Damage to Barriers has a 50% chance to restore 1 ammo.

epic.name: VOLSKAYA ORDNANCE
epic.description: Increases Attack Speed by 10%. Deal 5% increased Weapon Damage for every 100 Max Life the target has more than you, up to 20%.

epic.name: COMMANDER'S CLIP
epic.description: Increases Attack Speed by 10% and Max Ammo by 40%. When you use an ability, restore 10% of your Max Ammo.

epic.name: WEAPON JAMMER
epic.description: Increases Armor by 25 and Weapon Power by 10%. Dealing Weapon Damage negates 10% of the target's bonus Attack Speed and increases your Attack Speed by 10% for 2s.

epic.name: AMARI'S ANTIDOTE
epic.description: Increases Health by 25 and Weapon Power by 15%. While healing an ally below 50% Life with your Weapon, deal 15% increased Weapon Healing.

epic.name: BOOSTER JETS
epic.description: Increases Attack Speed by 20%. When you use an ability, gain 20% Move Speed for 2s.

epic.name: EL-SA'KA SUPPRESSOR
epic.description: Increases Weapon Power by 10%. Critical Hits apply 30% Healing Reduction to the target for 2s.

epic.name: HARDLIGHT ACCELERATOR
epic.description: Increases Weapon Power by 10% and provides 10% Cooldown Reduction. When you use an ability, gain 5% Weapon Power for 3s, stacking up to 3 times.

epic.name: THE CLOSER
epic.description: Increases Weapon Power by 20% and Critical Damage by 10%. Critical Hits reveal the target for 3s.

epic.name: EYE OF THE SPIDER
epic.description: Increases Weapon Power by 25%. Deal 10% increased damage to enemies below 30% Life.

common.name: CHARGED PLATING
common.description: After you spend your Ultimate Charge, gain 25 Armor and 10% Ability Power for the rest of the round.

common.name: WINNING ATTITUDE
common.description: Increases Health by 25. When you die, gain 15% Ultimate Charge.

rare.name: CUSTOM STOCK
rare.description: Increases Weapon Power by 5% and Ability Power by 10%.

rare.name: BIOLIGHT OVERFLOW
rare.description: Increases Health by 25 and Ability Power by 5%. When you spend your Ultimate Charge, grant nearby allies 50 Overhealth for 3s.

rare.name: ENERGIZED BRACERS
rare.description: Increases Ability Power by 10% and provides 10% Ability Lifesteal.

rare.name: JUNKER WHATCHAMAJIG
rare.description: Provides 25% Starting Ultimate Charge.

rare.name: WRIST WRAPS
rare.description: Increases Ability Power by 5% and Attack Speed by 10%.

rare.name: MULTI-TOOL
rare.description: Increases Ability Power by 5% and provides 10% Cooldown Reduction.

rare.name: NANO COLA
rare.description: Increases Ability Power by 20%.

epic.name: THREE-TAP TOMMYGUN
epic.description: Increases Ability Power by 10% and Attack Speed by 10%. After using an ability, your next 3 instances of Weapon Damage deal additional damage equal to 3% of the target's Life.

epic.name: BIOTECH MAXIMIZER
epic.description: Increases Health by 25 and Ability Power by 10%. When you use an ability that heals, reduce its cooldown by 5% for each unique ally it heals.

epic.name: CATALYTIC CRYSTAL
epic.description: Increases Ability Power by 15%. Ability Damage and Healing grants 20% more Ultimate Charge.

epic.name: LUMÉRICO FUSION DRIVE
epic.description: Increases Armor by 50 and Ability Power by 15%. When you use an ability, restore 50 Armor or Shields over 2s.

epic.name: SUPERFLEXOR
epic.description: Increases Health by 25 and Weapon Power by 10%. When you deal Weapon Damage or Healing, gain 5% Ability Power for 3s, stacking up to 5 times.

epic.name: CYBERVENOM
epic.description: Increases Ability Power by 10% and provides 5% Cooldown Reduction. Dealing Ability Damage applies 30% Healing Reduction for 2s.

epic.name: IRIDESCENT IRIS
epic.description: Increases Ability Power by 20% and provides 10% Cooldown Reduction. After spending your Ultimate Charge, gain 100 Overhealth for 3s.

epic.name: LIQUID NITROGEN
epic.description: Increases Health by 25 and Ability Power by 10%. Dealing Ability Damage slows the target's Move Speed by 20% for 3s.

epic.name: MARK OF THE KITSUNE
epic.description: Increases Ability Power by 10%. When you use an ability, your next instance of Weapon Damage or Healing deals 25 bonus damage or healing.

epic.name: CHAMPION'S KIT
epic.description: Increases Ability Power by 40%.

common.name: ADRENALINE SHOT
common.description: Increases Health by 10. Health Packs grant 20% Move Speed for 5s and 50 Overhealth.

common.name: ELECTROLYTES
common.description: At the start of the round, gain 100 unrecoverable Overhealth.

common.name: FIELD RATIONS
common.description: While on the Objective, restore 8 Life every 1s.

common.name: RUNNING SHOES
common.description: Increases Health by 10. At the start of the round and when you first respawn, gain 20% Move Speed for 10s while out of combat.

common.name: FIRST AID KIT
common.description: Increases Shields by 25. Reduce the time before your Life begins regenerating by 33%.

common.name: HEARTBEAT SENSOR
common.description: Increases Move Speed by 5%. Enemies below 30% Life are Revealed to you.

common.name: SIPHON GLOVES
common.description: Increases Health by 25. [Quick Melee] damage heals for 25 Life.

rare.name: REINFORCED TITANIUM
rare.description: Increases Shields by 25. While you have Shields, take 15% reduced Ability Damage.

rare.name: CUSHIONED PADDING
rare.description: Increases Shields by 25. Provides -40% Incoming Negative Effect Duration. When affected by Stun, Sleep, or Hinder, restore 10% of your max Life over 3s.

rare.name: IRONCLAD EXHAUST PORTS
rare.description: Provides 5% Cooldown Reduction. When you use an ability, gain 25 Overhealth for 3s.

rare.name: VISHKAR CONDENSOR
rare.description: Increases Shields by 25. Convert 100 Health into Shields.

rare.name: VITAL-E-TEE
rare.description: Increases Armor by 10. Convert 100 Health into Armor.

rare.name: CRUSADER HYDRAULICS
rare.description: Increases Armor by 25. While you have Armor, take 10% reduced Weapon Damage.

rare.name: IRON EYES
rare.description: Increases Shields by 25. You take 20% reduced damage from Critical Hits.

rare.name: MEKA Z-SERIES
rare.description: Increases Health, Armor, Shields by 8%.

epic.name: GENETICIST'S VIAL
epic.description: Increases Health by 25. The first time you would die each round, revive instead with 200 Life after 3s.

epic.name: BLOODBOUND
epic.description: Increases Health by 50. The last enemy to deal a final blow to you is Revealed when nearby. Deal 10% more damage to them and take 10% reduced damage from them.

epic.name: DIVINE INTERVENTION
epic.description: Increases Shields by 50. When you take more than 100 damage at once, restore 15% of damage taken and start regenerating your Shields.

epic.name: GLOOMGAUNTLET
epic.description: Increases Armor by 50 and Melee Damage by 15%. [Melee] Damage grants 10% Move Speed and restores 5% of Max Life over 2s.

epic.name: MARTIAN MENDER
epic.description: Increases Health by 25 and provides 10% Cooldown Reduction. Restore 3% of your Life every 1s.

epic.name: PHANTASMIC FLUX
epic.description: Increases Weapon Power by 10%, Ability Power by 10%, Weapon Lifesteal by 15%, and Ability Lifesteal by 15%. While at full Life, Lifesteal grants up to 100 Overhealth.

epic.name: RÜSTUNG VON WILHELM
epic.description: Increases Health, Armor, Shields by 15%. While below 30% Life, gain 10% Damage Reduction.

epic.name: VANADIUM INJECTION
epic.description: Increases Shields by 50. While at 100% Ultimate Charge, gain: 50 Health, 10% Weapon Power, 10% Ability Power, 10% Attack Speed, 10% Cooldown Reduction, 10% Move Speed.

epic.name: NEBULA CONDUIT
epic.description: Increases Health by 50 and Weapon Power by 10%. Prevent 15% of incoming damage and instead take that prevented damage over 3s.

epic.name: OGUNDIMU REDUCTION FIELD
epic.description: Increases Armor by 50. When you take damage, gain 0.5% Damage Reduction for 1s, stacking up to 20 times.
